summary: The Veggie Tales gang tells the story of Joseph and his brothers, set in a Ponderosa-like Western ranch.
cast: Mike Nawrocki|Jim Poole|Jackie Ritz|Mike Sage|Lisa Vischer|Phil Vischer|Tim Hodge|Justin Barrett|Joshua Gunther|Shari Martin|Mike Sanderson
title: VeggieTales: The Ballad of Little Joe
